title: Understanding Brexit's Breakthrough
description:
U.K. Prime Minister Theresa May emerged Wednesday from a five-hour Cabinet meeting with a key Brexit victory. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Brexit editor Emma Ross-Thomas on how that victory came to be and the perilous next step the deal faces. 
FOLLOW UP
 Emma's latest column: Theresa May’s Brexit Deal Victory Speech Sounded Hollow
You can follow Emma at: @emmarossthomas
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
